message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product. I'm excited to discuss the details with you. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer you the product for $1300000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'm looking to get from the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not comfortable going as low as $1200000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $1250000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer and propose $1225000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'm looking to get from the product.
